title: Looking for 3 people to join to (adc/mid/top) (bronze)
body:
Looking to get a more commint team sick of getting trolled and dc's. Myself and housemate are on everyday for normally 3 games or so. From 5pm- to 8 pm.  I'm a excellent jungler normally make the calls. 

Is anybody looking to join my team. 

Reply in here cheers

replies.body: Hello. I'm an adc main, currently playing {{champion:104}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:222}} and willing to learn and play any others. Add me, this is my main account. I do work tho, but 100% of the time I will have Wednesdays/Thursdays off.

COOOL.
I'm in Perth as well! 
I highly doubt I can consistently play 5pm to 8pm. Sharing internet with family. Might be able to, in Year 12 atm. 
Glad to see other Leaguers in Perth in these forums.

You can add me if you want. This is my main account.


____

 EDIT 

I've recently been practising ADC Lucian. ADC would probably be my worst role because of lack of CSing skills.

I am a decent Braum Support. As Braum I favour an aggressive playstyle.

I like playing Wukong Top. 

I don't particular aim to play the Top tier champions in any role.

B2 right now and climbing
Main{{champion:67}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:18}} 
Can play any day of the week and on all weekends

Hit me up ig <3
I can play every role, but I am best at mid>adc>top>sup>jg. But i can do every role pretty confidently. IGN Stormwolf6, i play usually every day at the same time as you, and am ATM b3

Hey man i'm a jgl/mid main but i also play adc
I play a fair bit and am also looking for people to play to get away from the trolls/toxic players
my IGN is jojolojo
But yeah I'm happy to fill just jgl/mid/adc are my strongest roles
Hi All, I'm in Melb and would love to join a bronze/silver team. I'm all-rounder player. Keen to learn and move up the ladder. Cheers.
Yeah sure! I main mid, but can top and jg and even adc. (Not the demonized role of support, eugh)

Hey again guys,

Ive added Pony/hoops/kjs/melanlady. 

If anybody doesnt get the friend requests today Please add me instead (TheWhiteD3vil). 

I'm hoping tonight to have at least a few games see how everyone gels and whats going to happen. Ill be on about 4pm today so please say hey when you get on
Hey. I sent a request. Probs be on for a few hours.
Where do you live exactly? As in time difference wise.
Interested.  Add me if slot still available.  Ho0ps.
Hey guys sounds good atm.  I'll add you tomorrow.  What champs are your mains?
